forecast.name: Today
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Snow Showers Likely then Rain And Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers likely before 9am, then rain and snow showers likely between 9am and 10am, then rain and snow showers between 10am and 2pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 47 in the afternoon. East southeast wind 13 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 51, with temperatures rising to around 61 overnight. South southwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between 1 and 2 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7am. Partly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 39. Northwest wind 3 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

nubsNob.date: Closed due to a widespread power outage and major ice storm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Closed for the season due to many down trees.
nubsNob.comments:
We are closed due to a widespread power outage. A major ice
storm has brought down thousands of trees in the area. It looks like power will not return for at least a few days. Updates will be posted here. Please stay safe and do not attempt to travel to Nub's Nob until it is safe to do so.
